name: Orbicular
description:
Orbicular is about spinning, you must spin. But only into the correct colour. Otherwise you lose. And you don't want to lose.

Press right to spin the cursor clockwise, and left to turn it anti-clockwise. Controllers are supported too if you swing that way.

Easy mode is easy, consider it training wheels, just to get you into the swing of things. Hard mode is where all the fun happens. Remember momentum.

Made for the #texturelessjam2015 jam in 4 days. Windows phone version available at http://bit.ly/1GtrpAm.
